陾陾陾

陾字的基本解释

陾
réng
〔陾陾〕众多的样子（一说筑墙声），如“捄之陾陾。”

陾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［réng］
［《廣韻》如之切，平之，日。］
［《廣韻》乃后切，上厚，泥。］
［《集韻》如蒸切，平蒸，日。］
亦作“陑2”。
(1)见“陾陾”。
(2)用同“堧”。边缘馀地。

陾字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　陾； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1356第01
【唐韻】如乗切【集韻】【韻會】如蒸切【正韻】如陵切，?音仍。【說文】築牆聲也。【詩·大雅】捄之陾陾。【傳】陾陾，衆也。　又【廣韻】如之切【集韻】人之切，?音而。【廣韻】本作?。亦作陑。互詳陑?二字註。【篇海】譌作?。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?乃后切，音㝅。【廣韻】衆陾。【集韻】衆也。

陾字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
陾字的起名意思

暂无。

sound of shovel
Basic explanation of words
sound of shovel
réng
〔陾陾] There are many appearances (for example, the sound of building a wall), such as "Shooting the door."
sound of shovel
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［réng］
["Guangyun" is like cut, flat, day. ]
["Guangyun" is a back cut, thick top, and mud. ]
["Jiyun" is like steaming and cutting, flat steaming, day. ]
Also known as "陑2".
(1) See "Quelu".
(2) Use the same as "堧". Marginal margin.
sound of shovel
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[戌集] [Fu Character Department] 　陾; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1356 No. 01
[Tang Yun] Such as Chengqie [Jiyun] [Rhyme] Such as steaming and cutting [Zhengyun] Such as mausoleum cutting, the sound remains. [Said Wen] The sound of building walls. 【Poetry·Daya】The stunner. 【Biography】Quanlu, everyone.　[Guangyun] As cut through [Jiyun] Cut through people,? Sound. [Guang Yun] This work?. Also known as que. Mutual details? Two-character note. 【Article Sea】Zhao Zuo?.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? After cutting, sound 㝅. [Guang Yun] Zhong Lu. [Jiyun] All too.
